085/**
086 *  The main controller for the Shooting Timer application.
087 *
088 *  @version $Id: MainController.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
089 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
090 *  @UMLGraph.link
091 *  @since 0.1.0
092 */
093@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: MainController.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
094@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
095public class MainController
096{
097        /*---------------*\
098    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
099        \*---------------*/
100    /**
101     *  This class will manage the status for the lights.
102     *
103     *  @version $Id: MainController.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
104     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
105     *  @UMLGraph.link
106     *  @since 0.1.0
107     */
108    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: MainController.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
109    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
110    private static class Light
111    {
112            /*-----------*\
113        ====** Constants **====================================================
114            \*-----------*/
115        /**
116         *  The color for the OFF state.
117         */
118        private final Color m_OffColor = Color.GRAY;
119
120            /*------------*\
121        ====** Attributes **===================================================
122            \*------------*/
123        /**
124         *  The method that is used to set the colour for the light.
125         */
126        private final Consumer<Color> m_ColorChanger;
127
128        /**
129         *  The color for the ON state.
130         */
131        private final Color m_OnColor;
132
133        /**
134         *  The current status; {@code true} mean ON, {@code false} is OFF.
135         */
136        private boolean m_Status = false;
137
138            /*--------------*\
139        ====** Constructors **=================================================
140            \*--------------*/
141        /**
142         *  Creates a new {@code Light} instance.
143         *
144         *  @param  onColor The colour for the ON state.
145         *  @param  colorChanger    The method that is used to set the colour
146         *      for the light.
147         */
148        public Light( final Color onColor, final Consumer<Color> colorChanger )
149        {
150            m_ColorChanger = requireNonNullArgument( colorChanger, "colorChanger" );
151            m_OnColor = requireNonNullArgument( onColor, "onColor" );
152        }   //  Light()
153
154            /*---------*\
155        ====** Methods **======================================================
156            \*---------*/
157        /**
158         *  Switches the light off.
159         */
160        public final void off()
161        {
162            m_Status = false;
163            m_ColorChanger.accept( m_OffColor );
164        }   //  off()
165
166        /**
167         *  Switches the light off.
168         */
169        public final void on()
170        {
171            m_Status = true;
172            m_ColorChanger.accept( m_OnColor );
173        }   //  off()
174
175        /**
176         *  Toggles the light.
177         */
178        public final void toggle()
179        {
180            if( m_Status )
181            {
182                off();
183            }
184            else
185            {
186                on();
187            }
188        }   //  toggle()
189    }
190    //  class Light
191

451        /*--------------*\
452    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
453        \*--------------*/
454    /**
455     *  Creates a new {@code MainController} instance.
456     */
457    public MainController()
458    {
459        //---* Load the preferences *------------------------------------------
460        m_Preferences = Preferences.userNodeForPackage( getClass() );
461        m_Preferences.addPreferenceChangeListener( this::preferenceChanged );
462
463        //---* Create the lock *-----------------------------------------------
464        var lock = new ReentrantLock( false );
465        m_HeatThreadGuard = AutoLock.of( lock );
466        lock = new ReentrantLock( false );
467        m_StatusControlGuard = AutoLock.of( lock );
468
469        //---* Create the status control *-------------------------------------
470        m_StatusControl = new SimpleObjectProperty<>();
471        m_StatusControl.addListener( this::statusTransition );
472    }   //  MainController()
473
474
475        /*---------*\
476    ====** Methods **==========================================================
477        \*---------*/
478    /**
479     *  Executes the current heat.
480     */
481    @SuppressWarnings( "BusyWait" )
482    private final void executeHeat()
483    {
484        var proceed = !interrupted();
485
486        //---* Retrieve the current heat settings *----------------------------
487        final var heat = m_ChoiceBox_Program.getValue();
488
489        //---* Execute ... *---------------------------------------------------
490        setStatusStarting();
491        proceedToNextStatus();
492        final var beforeTime = (long) (m_Slider_BeforeTime.getValue() * 1000.0);
493        if( beforeTime > 0.0 )
494        {
495            try
496            {
497                sleep( beforeTime );
498            }
499            catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final InterruptedException e )
500            {
501                proceed = false;
502            }
503        }
504        if( !heat.isRepeated() ) proceedToNextStatus();
505
506        final var heatCount = new AtomicInteger();
507
508        RepeatLoop: for( var r = 0; (r < heat.getRepetitions()) && proceed; ++r )
509        {
510            if( heat.isRepeated() ) setStatusProlog();
511
512            //---* Update the heat count *-------------------------------------
513            heatCount.set( r + 1 );
514            runLater( () -> m_Label_HeatCount.setText( Integer.toString( heatCount.get() ) ) );
515
516            //---* Start the prolog *------------------------------------------
517            var endTime = currentTimeMillis() + heat.getPrologTime();
518            var scheduledService = new TimeUpdateService( endTime, m_TextField_Time );
519            scheduledService.start();
520            PrologLoop: while( currentTimeMillis() < endTime )
521            {
522                if( interrupted() )
523                {
524                    proceed = false;
525                    break PrologLoop;
526                }
527                try
528                {
529                    sleep( endTime - currentTimeMillis() );
530                }
531                catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final InterruptedException e )
532                {
533                    proceed = false;
534                    break PrologLoop;
535                }
536            }   //  PrologLoop:
537
538            scheduledService.stop();
539            proceedToNextStatus();
540
541            if( proceed )
542            {
543                //---* Start the shooting *------------------------------------
544                endTime = currentTimeMillis() + heat.getShootingTime();
545                scheduledService = new TimeUpdateService( endTime, m_TextField_Time );
546                scheduledService.start();
547                ShootingLoop: while( currentTimeMillis() < endTime )
548                {
549                    if( interrupted() )
550                    {
551                        proceed = false;
552                        break ShootingLoop;
553                    }
554                    try
555                    {
556                        sleep( endTime - currentTimeMillis() );
557                    }
558                    catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final InterruptedException e )
559                    {
560                        proceed = false;
561                        break ShootingLoop;
562                    }
563                }   //  ShootingLoop:
564                scheduledService.stop();
565            }
566
567            proceed &= !interrupted();
568        }   //  RepeatLoop:
569
570        if( proceed )
571        {
572            //---* After shooting *--------------------------------------------
573            proceedToNextStatus();
574            final var epilogTime = (long) (m_Slider_AfterTime.getValue() * 1_000.0);
575            if( epilogTime > 0.0 )
576            {
577                try
578                {
579                    sleep( epilogTime );
580                }
581                catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final InterruptedException e ) { /* Deliberately ignored */ }
582            }
583        }
584
585        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
586        m_HeatThread = null;
587        reset();
588    }   //  executeHeat()
589
590    /**
591     *  Initialises the controller.
592     */
593    @FXML
594    private final void initialize()
595    {
596        assert nonNull( m_Button_Abort ) : "fx:id=\"m_Button_Abort\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
597        assert nonNull( m_Button_Start ) : "fx:id=\"m_Button_Start\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
598        assert nonNull( m_ButtonPane ) : "fx:id=\"m_ButtonPane\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
599        assert nonNull( m_CheckMenuItem_ShowHeatCount ) : "fx:id=\"m_CheckMenuItem_ShowHeatCount\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
600        assert nonNull( m_CheckMenuItem_ShowStatus ) : "fx:id=\"m_CheckMenuItem_ShowStatus\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
601        assert nonNull( m_CheckMenuItem_ShowTime ) : "fx:id=\"m_CheckMenuItem_ShowTime\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
602        assert nonNull( m_CheckMenuItem_Sound ) : "fx:id=\"m_CheckMenuItem_Sound\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
603        assert nonNull( m_ChoiceBox_Program ) : "fx:id=\"m_ChoiceBox_Program\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
604        assert nonNull( m_Circle_Green ) : "fx:id=\"m_Circle_Green\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
605        assert nonNull( m_Circle_Red ) : "fx:id=\"m_Circle_Red\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
606        assert nonNull( m_DisciplinesToggleGroup ) : "fx:id=\"m_DisciplinesToggleGroup\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
607        assert nonNull( m_Label_HeatCount ) : "fx:id=\"m_Label_HeatCount\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
608        assert nonNull( m_Label_SelectedDiscipline ) : "fx:id=\"m_Label_SelectedDiscipline\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
609        assert nonNull( m_Label_Status ) : "fx:id=\"m_Label_Status\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
610        assert nonNull( m_LightBox ) : "fx:id=\"m_LightBox\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
611        assert nonNull( m_Slider_AfterTime ) : "fx:id=\"m_Slider_AfterTime\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
612        assert nonNull( m_Slider_BeforeTime ) : "fx:id=\"m_Slider_BeforeTime\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
613        assert nonNull( m_TextField_Time ) : "fx:id=\"m_TextField_Time\" was not injected: check your FXML file 'Main.fxml'.";
614        assert nonNull( resources ) : "The resource bundle was not injected";
615
616        //---* Load the sounds *-----------------------------------------------
617        if( "arm".equalsIgnoreCase( getProperty( PROPERTY_CPUARCHITECTURE ) ) )
618        {
619            /*
620             * Currently (as for 2017-08-19) JavaFX has issues to play media on
621             * the Raspberry PI 3, due to a problem with libjfxmedia.so.
622             * Therefore, we do now allow audio/sound on a Raspberry PI.
623             */
624            m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setDisable( true );
625            m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setSelected( false );
626
627            m_StartSound = Optional.empty();
628            m_EndSound = Optional.empty();
629        }
630        else
631        {
632            //---* Sets the sound flag *---------------------------------------
633            m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setDisable( false );
634            final var soundFlag = m_Preferences.getBoolean( PREF_NODE_Sound, false );
635            m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setSelected( soundFlag );
636
637            //---* Load the audio clips *--------------------------------------
638            var audioClipURL = getClass().getResource( SOUND_ENDSHOOTING );
639            if( nonNull( audioClipURL ) )
640            {
641                var audioClip = new AudioClip( audioClipURL.toExternalForm() );
642                audioClip.play();
643                audioClip.stop();
644                m_EndSound = Optional.of( audioClip );
645
646                /*
647                 * We try to load the start sound only when we have an end
648                 * sound.
649                 */
650                audioClipURL = getClass().getResource( SOUND_STARTSHOOTING );
651                if( nonNull( audioClipURL ) )
652                {
653                    audioClip = new AudioClip( audioClipURL.toExternalForm() );
654                    audioClip.play();
655                    audioClip.stop();
656                    m_StartSound = Optional.of( audioClip );
657
658                    //---* Sets the listener for the sound flag menu item *----
659                    m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.selectedProperty().addListener( (p,o,n) -> m_Preferences.putBoolean( PREF_NODE_Sound, n ) );
660                }
661                else
662                {
663                    m_StartSound = Optional.empty();
664                    m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setDisable( true );
665                    m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setSelected( false );
666                }
667            }
668            else
669            {
670                m_EndSound = Optional.empty();
671                m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setDisable( true );
672                m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.setSelected( false );
673            }
674        }
675
676        /*
677         * Although this can be set also in the *.fxml file, it should be done
678         * here.
679         * This is because when it is set in *.fxml, the screen remain blank
680         * until the mouse is moved over the menu or the button.
681         */
682        m_TextField_Time.setFocusTraversable( false );
683
684        //---* Bind the "show time" flag to the time text field *--------------
685        /*
686         * For some reason, this could not be set in the *.fxgraph file.
687         */
688        m_TextField_Time.visibleProperty()
689            .bind( m_CheckMenuItem_ShowTime.selectedProperty() );
690
691        /*
692         * The button pane should be visible only when at least one button is
693         * enabled.
694         */
695        m_ButtonPane.visibleProperty()
696            .bind( m_Button_Abort.disabledProperty().and( m_Button_Start.disabledProperty() ).not() );
697
698        //---* Sets the "show time" flag *-------------------------------------
699        final var showTimeFlag = m_Preferences.getBoolean( PREF_NODE_ShowTime, true );
700        m_CheckMenuItem_ShowTime.setSelected( showTimeFlag );
701
702        //---* Sets the listener for the "show time" flag menu item *----------
703        m_CheckMenuItem_ShowTime.selectedProperty()
704            .addListener( (p,o,n) -> m_Preferences.putBoolean( PREF_NODE_ShowTime, n ) );
705
706        //---* Initialises the additional times *------------------------------
707        final var prologTime = m_Preferences.getDouble( PREF_NODE_Before, 0.0 );
708        m_Slider_BeforeTime.setValue( prologTime );
709        m_Slider_BeforeTime.valueProperty()
710            .addListener( (p,o,n) -> m_Preferences.putDouble( PREF_NODE_Before, n.doubleValue() ) );
711
712        final var epilogTime = m_Preferences.getDouble( PREF_NODE_TimeAfter, 0.0 );
713        m_Slider_AfterTime.setValue( epilogTime );
714        m_Slider_AfterTime.valueProperty()
715            .addListener( (p,o,n) -> m_Preferences.putDouble( PREF_NODE_TimeAfter, n.doubleValue() ) );
716
717        //---* Set the change listener for the selected discipline *-----------
718        m_SelectedDiscipline.addListener( this::onDisciplineChanged );
719
720        //---* Get the currently selected discipline *-------------------------
721        final var heatNumber = m_Preferences.getInt( PREF_NODE_Heat, 0 );
722        final var disciplineName = m_Preferences.get( PREF_NODE_Discipline, DISCIPLINE_2_17.name() );
723        final var discipline = Discipline.valueOf( disciplineName );
724        m_DisciplinesToggleGroup.getToggles()
725            .stream()
726            .filter( toggle -> toggle.getUserData() == discipline )
727            .findFirst()
728            .ifPresent( m_DisciplinesToggleGroup::selectToggle );
729        final var selectedToggle = m_DisciplinesToggleGroup.getSelectedToggle();
730        if( nonNull( selectedToggle) )
731        {
732            m_SelectedDiscipline.set( (Discipline) selectedToggle.getUserData() );
733        }
734
735        //---* Set the listener for the heat changes *-------------------------
736        m_ChoiceBox_Program.valueProperty()
737            .addListener( (p,o,n) ->
738            {
739                final var program = m_SelectedDiscipline.getValue().getProgram();
740                var h = -1;
741                for( var i = 0; i < program.length; ++i )
742                {
743                    if( program [i] == n ) h = i;
744                }
745                if( h >= 0 ) m_Preferences.putInt( PREF_NODE_Heat, h );
746            } );
747
748        //---* Set the heat *--------------------------------------------------
749        if( heatNumber != 0 )
750        {
751            final var heat = discipline.getProgram() [heatNumber];
752            m_ChoiceBox_Program.setValue( heat );
753        }
754
755        //---* Configure the choice box for the program *----------------------
756        m_ChoiceBox_Program.setConverter( Heat.getStringConverter() );
757
758        //---* Set the change listener for the disciplines menu *--------------
759        m_DisciplinesToggleGroup.selectedToggleProperty()
760            .addListener( this::onDisciplineSelectionChanged );
761
762        //---* Set the radius for the lights *---------------------------------
763        m_Circle_Green.radiusProperty()
764            .bind( Bindings.min( m_LightBox.widthProperty().divide( 2.0 ), m_LightBox.heightProperty() ).divide( 2.0 ).subtract( 20.0 ) );
765        m_Circle_Red.radiusProperty()
766            .bind( Bindings.min( m_LightBox.widthProperty().divide( 2.0 ), m_LightBox.heightProperty() ).divide( 2.0 ).subtract( 20.0 ) );
767
768        //---* Create the light instances *------------------------------------
769        m_GreenLight = new Light( Color.GREEN, m_Circle_Green::setFill );
770        m_RedLight = new Light( Color.RED, m_Circle_Red::setFill );
771
772        //---* Sets the show status flag *-------------------------------------
773        final var showStatusFlag = m_Preferences.getBoolean( PREF_NODE_ShowStatus, false );
774        m_CheckMenuItem_ShowStatus.setSelected( showStatusFlag );
775
776        //---* Sets the listener for the show status flag menu item *----------
777        m_CheckMenuItem_ShowStatus.selectedProperty()
778            .addListener( (p,o,n) -> m_Preferences.putBoolean( PREF_NODE_ShowStatus, n ) );
779
780        //---* Bind the status label to the status control *-------------------
781        /*
782        //m_Label_Status.textProperty().bind( m_StatusControl.asString() );
783         *
784         * Unfortunately this does not work as expected, as the label will not
785         * be updated when the status changes.
786         */
787
788        m_Label_Status.visibleProperty()
789            .bind( m_CheckMenuItem_ShowStatus.selectedProperty() );
790
791        //---* Sets the show heat count flag *---------------------------------
792        final var showHeatCountFlag = m_Preferences.getBoolean( PREF_NODE_ShowHeatCount, true );
793        m_CheckMenuItem_ShowHeatCount.setSelected( showHeatCountFlag );
794
795        //---* Sets the listener for the show heat count flag menu item *------
796        m_CheckMenuItem_ShowHeatCount.selectedProperty()
797            .addListener( (p,o,n) -> m_Preferences.putBoolean( PREF_NODE_ShowHeatCount, n ) );
798
799        //---* Sets the size for the heat count label *------------------------
800        if( "arm".equalsIgnoreCase( getProperty( PROPERTY_CPUARCHITECTURE ) ) )
801        {
802            m_Label_HeatCount.setStyle( "-fx-font-size : 30.0;" );
803        }
804        else
805        {
806            m_Label_HeatCount.setStyle( "-fx-font-size : 250.0;" );
807        }
808
809        //---* Set the initial state *-----------------------------------------
810        reset();
811    }   //  initialize()
812
813    /**
814     *  Sets the lights to the off state.
815     */
816    private final void lightsOff()
817    {
818        asList( m_RedLight, m_GreenLight )
819            .forEach( Light::off );
820    }   //  lightsOff()
821
822    /**
823     *  The button handler for the
824     *  {@link #m_Button_Abort ABORT}
825     *  button.
826     *
827     *  @param  ignoredEvent    The action event.
828     */
829    @FXML
830    private final void onAbort( final ActionEvent ignoredEvent )
831    {
832        //---* Disable the abort button *--------------------------------------
833        m_Button_Abort.setDisable( true );
834
835        try( var ignored = m_HeatThreadGuard.lock() )
836        {
837            //---* Stop the heat thread *---------------------------------------
838            if( nonNull( m_HeatThread ) && m_HeatThread.isAlive() )
839            {
840                var t = m_HeatThread;
841                m_HeatThread = null;
842                t.interrupt();
843                try
844                {
845                    t.join( 1000 );
846                }
847                catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final InterruptedException e ) { /* Deliberately ignored */ }
848            }
849        }
850
851        //---* Reset the system *----------------------------------------------
852        reset();
853    }   //  onAbort()
854
855    /**
856     *  The change listener for the selected discipline.
857     *
858     *  @param  observable  The observed entity.
859     *  @param  oldValue    The old value.
860     *  @param  newValue    The new value.
861     */
862    private final void onDisciplineChanged( final ObservableValue<? extends Discipline> observable, final Discipline oldValue, final Discipline newValue )
863    {
864        if( nonNull( newValue ) )
865        {
866            final var text = newValue.toString();
867            m_Label_SelectedDiscipline.setText( text );
868            final var program = m_ChoiceBox_Program.getItems();
869            program.clear();
870            program.addAll( newValue.getProgram() );
871            m_ChoiceBox_Program.setValue( program.get( 0 ) );
872
873            //---* Update the preferences *------------------------------------
874            m_Preferences.put( PREF_NODE_Discipline, newValue.name() );
875            m_Preferences.putInt( PREF_NODE_Heat, 0 );
876        }
877    }   //  onDisciplineChanged()
878
879    /**
880     *  The change listener for the disciplines in the menu.
881     *
882     *  @param  observable  The observed entity.
883     *  @param  oldValue    The old value.
884     *  @param  newValue    The new value.
885     */
886    private final void onDisciplineSelectionChanged( final ObservableValue<? extends Toggle> observable, final Toggle oldValue, final Toggle newValue )
887    {
888        if( nonNull( newValue ) ) m_SelectedDiscipline.set( (Discipline) newValue.getUserData() );
889    }   //  onDisciplineSelectionChanged()
890
891    /**
892     *  The handler method that initialises the termination of the application.
893     *  It is assigned to the {@code MENU_FILE_EXIT} menu item.
894     *
895     *  @param  ignoredEvent    The action event.
896     */
897    @SuppressWarnings( "static-method" )
898    @FXML
899    private final void onExit( final ActionEvent ignoredEvent )
900    {
901        exit();
902    }   //  onExit()
903
904    /**
905     *  Responds to the menu item {@code Help|About} and shows the
906     *  &quot;About&quot; dialog.
907     *
908     *  @param  event   The event that triggered this handler.
909     */
910    @FXML
911    private final void onMenuAbout( final ActionEvent event )
912    {
913        event.consume();
914        try
915        {
916            final var mainClass = Main.class;
917
918            /*
919             * Get the parent window for the &quot;About&quot; window. This is
920             * the owner of the menu.
921             */
922            final var ownerWindow = ((MenuItem) event.getSource()).getParentPopup().getOwnerWindow();
923
924            //---* Get the user data from the scene of the parent window *-----
925            final var mainSceneUserData = retrieveUserData( ownerWindow.getScene(), mainClass )
926                .orElseThrow();
927            final var application = mainSceneUserData.getApplication();
928
929            //---* Create the new stage *--------------------------------------
930            final var stage = new Stage( UTILITY );
931
932            //---* Assign the parent *-----------------------------------------
933            stage.initOwner( ownerWindow );
934
935            //---* Load the *.fxml and create the scene root *-----------------
936            final var fxmlFileName = "About.fxml";
937            final var fxmlURL = mainClass.getResource( fxmlFileName );
938            if( isNull( fxmlURL ) )
939            {
940                throw new ApplicationError( application.retrieveMessage( resources, MSGKEY_CannotLoadUIDefinition, fxmlFileName ) );
941            }
942            final Pane root = FXMLLoader.load( fxmlURL, resources );
943
944            //---* Create the new scene *--------------------------------------
945            SceneUserData.createScene( mainSceneUserData, stage, root );
946
947            //---* Configure the stage *---------------------------------------
948            stage.setAlwaysOnTop( true );
949            stage.setTitle( resources.getString( "TITLE_ABOUT" ) );
950            stage.sizeToScene();
951            stage.centerOnScreen();
952            stage.showAndWait();
953        }
954        catch( final Exception e )
955        {
956            throw new ApplicationError( e );
957        }
958    }   //  onMenuAbout()
959
960    /**
961     *  The handler method for the
962     *  {@link #m_Button_Start START}
963     *  button.
964     *
965     *  @param  ignoredEvent   The action event.
966     */
967    @FXML
968    private final void onStart( final ActionEvent ignoredEvent )
969    {
970        //---* Start the sequence *--------------------------------------------
971        reset();
972        proceedToNextStatus();
973
974        try( var ignored = m_HeatThreadGuard.lock() )
975        {
976            //---* Execute the heat *------------------------------------------
977            m_HeatThread = new Thread( this::executeHeat );
978            m_HeatThread.setDaemon( true );
979            m_HeatThread.start();
980        }
981    }   //  onStart()
982
983    /**
984     *  The handler method for touches to the grid pane.
985     *
986     *  @param  event   The touch event.
987     */
988    @FXML
989    private final void onTouch( final TouchEvent event )
990    {
991        final var buttonEvent = new ActionEvent( event.getSource(), event.getTarget() );
992
993        try( var ignored = m_HeatThreadGuard.lock() )
994        {
995            if( isNull( m_HeatThread ) || !m_HeatThread.isAlive() )
996            {
997                onStart( buttonEvent );
998            }
999            else
1000            {
1001                onAbort( buttonEvent );
1002            }
1003        }
1004    }   //  onTouch()
1005
1006    /**
1007     *  The change listener for the preferences.
1008     *
1009     *  @param  event   The change event.
1010     */
1011    private final void preferenceChanged( final PreferenceChangeEvent event )
1012    {
1013        final var preferences = event.getNode();
1014        try
1015        {
1016            preferences.flush();
1017        }
1018        catch( final BackingStoreException e )
1019        {
1020            //---* We will not terminate the program â¦ *-----------------------
1021            e.printStackTrace( err );
1022        }
1023    }   //  preferenceChanged()
1024
1025    /**
1026     *  Proceeds to the next status.
1027     */
1028    @SuppressWarnings( "UnnecessaryDefault" )
1029    private final void proceedToNextStatus()
1030    {
1031        /*
1032         * We do not rely on the sequence the enum values of Status are defined
1033         * in; instead, we do it the verbose way.
1034         */
1035        try( var ignored = m_StatusControlGuard.lock() )
1036        {
1037            var currentStatus = m_StatusControl.get();
1038            var newStatus = switch( currentStatus )
1039            {
1040                case null, STATUS_OFF -> STATUS_STARTING;
1041                case STATUS_STARTING -> STATUS_BEFORE;
1042                case STATUS_BEFORE -> STATUS_PROLOG;
1043                case STATUS_PROLOG -> STATUS_SHOOTING;
1044                case STATUS_SHOOTING -> STATUS_AFTER;
1045                case STATUS_AFTER -> STATUS_OFF;
1046                default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( currentStatus );
1047            };
1048
1049            //---* Apply the new status *--------------------------------------
1050            m_StatusControl.set( newStatus );
1051        }
1052    }   //  proceedToNextStatus()
1053
1054    /**
1055     *  Resets the system status.
1056     */
1057    private final void reset()
1058    {
1059        try( var ignored = m_StatusControlGuard.lock() )
1060        {
1061            m_StatusControl.set( STATUS_OFF );
1062        }
1063    }   //  reset()
1064
1065    /**
1066     *  Sets the system status to
1067     *  {@link Status#STATUS_PROLOG}.
1068     */
1069    private final void setStatusProlog()
1070    {
1071        try( var ignored = m_StatusControlGuard.lock() )
1072        {
1073            m_StatusControl.set( STATUS_PROLOG );
1074        }
1075    }   //  setStatusProlog()
1076
1077    /**
1078     *  Sets the system status to
1079     *  {@link Status#STATUS_STARTING}.
1080     */
1081    private final void setStatusStarting()
1082    {
1083        try( var ignored = m_StatusControlGuard.lock() )
1084        {
1085            m_StatusControl.set( STATUS_STARTING );
1086        }
1087    }   //  setStatusStarting()
1088
1089    /**
1090     *  The change listener for the status control.<br>
1091     *  <br>This method controls the current display.
1092     *
1093     *  @param  ignoredObservable   The observed entity; ignored.
1094     *  @param  oldStatus   The previous status.
1095     *  @param  newStatus   The new status.
1096     */
1097    private final void statusTransition( final ObservableValue<? extends Status> ignoredObservable, final Status oldStatus, final Status newStatus )
1098    {
1099        try( var ignored = m_StatusControlGuard.lock() )
1100        {
1101            if( nonNull( newStatus ) )
1102            {
1103                runLater( () -> m_Label_Status.setText( newStatus.toString() ) );
1104
1105                StatusSwitch:
1106                switch( newStatus )
1107                {
1108                    case STATUS_AFTER -> {
1109                        //---* Stop the start sound and play the end sound *---
1110                        if( m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.isSelected() )
1111                        {
1112                            m_StartSound.ifPresent( s -> {
1113                                if( s.isPlaying() )
1114                                    s.stop();
1115                            } );
1116                            m_EndSound.ifPresent( AudioClip::play );
1117                        }
1118
1119                        //---* Disable the abort button *----------------------
1120                        m_Button_Abort.setDisable( true );
1121
1122                        //---* Change the lights *-----------------------------
1123                        m_RedLight.toggle();
1124                        m_GreenLight.toggle();
1125
1126                        //---* Hide the heat count *---------------------------
1127                        m_Label_HeatCount.setVisible( false );
1128                    }
1129                    case STATUS_BEFORE -> {
1130                        //---* Disable the start button *----------------------
1131                        m_Button_Start.setDisable( true );
1132
1133                        //---* Enable the abort button *----------------------
1134                        m_Button_Abort.setDisable( false );
1135
1136                        //---* Focus the abort button *------------------------
1137                        runLater( m_Button_Abort::requestFocus );
1138                    }
1139                    case STATUS_OFF -> {
1140                        //---* Set the default time *--------------------------
1141                        m_TextField_Time.setText( format( "%3.1f", 0.0 ) );
1142
1143                        //---* Enable the start button *-----------------------
1144                        m_Button_Start.setDisable( false );
1145
1146                        //---* Disable the abort button *----------------------
1147                        m_Button_Abort.setDisable( true );
1148
1149                        //---* Focus the start button *------------------------
1150                        runLater( m_Button_Start::requestFocus );
1151
1152                        //---* Hide the heat count *---------------------------
1153                        m_Label_HeatCount.setVisible( false );
1154
1155                        //---* Switch off the lights *-------------------------
1156                        lightsOff();
1157                    }
1158                    case STATUS_PROLOG -> {
1159                        if( oldStatus == STATUS_SHOOTING )
1160                        {
1161                            if( m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.isSelected() )
1162                            {
1163                                /*
1164                                 * Stop the start sound and play the end sound.
1165                                 */
1166                                m_StartSound.ifPresent( s -> {
1167                                    if( s.isPlaying() )
1168                                        s.stop();
1169                                } );
1170                                m_EndSound.ifPresent( AudioClip::play );
1171                            }
1172
1173                            //---* Switch off the red light *------------------
1174                            m_GreenLight.off();
1175                        }
1176
1177                        //---* Show the heat count *---------------------------
1178                        if( m_ChoiceBox_Program.getValue().isRepeated() && m_CheckMenuItem_ShowHeatCount.isSelected() )
1179                        {
1180                            m_Label_HeatCount.setVisible( true );
1181                        }
1182
1183                        //---* Switch on the red light *-----------------------
1184                        m_RedLight.on();
1185                    }
1186                    case STATUS_SHOOTING -> {
1187                        //---* Play the start sound *--------------------------
1188                        if( m_CheckMenuItem_Sound.isSelected() )
1189                            m_StartSound.ifPresent( AudioClip::play );
1190
1191                        //---* Switch on the green light *---------------------
1192                        m_GreenLight.on();
1193
1194                        //---* Switch off the red light *----------------------
1195                        m_RedLight.off();
1196
1197                        //---* Leave the switch *------------------------------
1198                        break StatusSwitch;
1199                    }
1200
1201                    //---* Disable the start button *--------------------------
1202                    case STATUS_STARTING -> m_Button_Start.setDisable( true );
1203
1204                    default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( newStatus );
1205                }   //  StatusSwitch:
1206            }
1207        }
1208    }   //  statusTransition()
1209}
1210//  class MainController
1211

1213 *  End of File
